snippet.title: Johnny Depp's 'Transcendence' Is A No-Fault Box Office Bomb
snippet.description: Transcendence opened last weekend and is pretty much the very definition of a bomb. The $100 million production opened with just $11 million. With poor reviews, no buzz, and the summer season just around the corner, it's sure to sink fast and needs an overseas miracle to have any hope of [...] read »

snippet.title: Punishing Johnny (Manziel)
snippet.description: The accusations against Johnny Manziel may cost him several games or an entire season of suspension. In a bigger view, however, the episode shines more light on the professional world of college sports that masquerades as amateurism. read »

snippet.title: Browns Deal Aimed At Bringing Johnny Football To Cleveland?
snippet.description: The Browns deal promising running back Trent Richardson to the Colts for a first round pick. And they sure need a quarterback. read »

snippet.title: Rich Little: Impersonating Retirement
snippet.description: Have you ever wondered what advice John Wayne would give you about retirement? Or how Jimmy Stewart would describe his golden years? I asked impressionist extraordinaire Rich Little what he thought, as well as how, when, and if he, himself, is planning to retire. read »

snippet.title: Lady Gaga And Johnny Depp: When Celebs Slam Critics
snippet.description: Lady Gaga’s message has always been to be yourself and stop caring what anyone thinks of you, so why does she suddenly care about a few critics? read »

snippet.title: Johnny Be Dumb As Manziel's Mayhem Outpaces NCAA's Hypocrisy
snippet.description: On Sunday, numerous stories (here, here, and here) reported that The NCAA is investigating whether Heisman Trophy winner Johnny Manziel was paid for signing hundreds of autographs on photos and sports memorabilia in January. The report is that he received something in the 5-figure range for signing various pieces of [...] read »

snippet.title: How Much Johnny Manziel Loses Per Frat Party Ouster
snippet.description: Johnny Manziel may be the only quartberback looking to enter next year's NFL draft to already lose $5 million a year for frat party mishaps. Very expensive parties. read »

snippet.title: Johnny Manziel Won More Than He Lost In Defeat To Top-Ranked Alabama
snippet.description: Johnny Manziel celebrates after throwing a first quarter touchdown against Alabama on Saturday at Kyle Field in College Station, TX. Sometimes in life, we lose the battle but win the war. The battle Johnny Manziel lost was his much-hyped and thoroughly entertaining rematch with Alabama that ended in a ho-hum 49-42 defeat, [...] read »
